title: President condemns attack in Balochistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 28 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday strongly condemning the attack on soldiers in Balochistan said such cowardly attacks could not dampen the spirit to fight terrorism.
The president expressed deep sorrow over the martyrdom of 10 soldiers and expressed sympathy with their families.
He said Pakistan was committed to eradicate terrorism.
